trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Cumming
There were no other sightings in Cumming on or around April 10th 2013
Summary: Was having a cig, noticed what i 1st thought was a brief reddish shooting star. Then a localized light pulse/flash, not similar to other visible airplane. then faded out. not in a directional manner.
divs: sighting details1. on my back patio looking up smoking a tobacco cigarette. 2. a reddish, shooting star like streak. 3. a shimmering star or airplane. 4. a repeated pulsation of dissimilar to other objects (stars, airplanes at varying altitudes) light over about two minutes. 5. i looked around to see if any of my neighbors might be up and noticing something, unsurpisingly no one was there, i considered waking my family up. amazement. 6. it faded\left my sight in an unfamiliar fashion for anything in the sky.
